# Exploratory Data Analysis

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(patchwork)
```

## Introduction

This dashboard explores Pokemon stat design across generations using the 01-04-25 TidyTuesday dataset.

```{r load_dataset, include=FALSE}
pokemon_df <- read_csv("data/pokemon_df.csv")
```

```{r stat_distribution, echo=FALSE}
df_long <- pokemon_df %>%
  pivot_longer(
    cols = c(hp, attack, defense, special_attack, special_defense, speed),
    names_to = "stat",
    values_to = "value"
  )

ggplot(df_long, aes(x = value, fill = stat)) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 30, alpha = 0.7, color = "white") +
  facet_wrap(~stat, scales = "free") +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(
    title = "Distribution of Pokemon Stats",
    x = "Stat Value",
    y = "Count"
  )
```
